name: The King of Fighters '94 Re-Bout
description:
The King of Fighters '94 Re-Bout is a fighting game developed by Ukiyotei. It came out on 28-12-2004. It was published by SNK. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play The King of Fighters '94 Re-Bout on PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Eikichi Kawasaki and Takashi Nishiyama. Masanori Kuwasashi directed the game. Masahiko Hataya scored the game.
